mobile-cta.signup-heading: Sign up to explore the world's best ideas
mobile-cta.legal-text: By continuing, you agree to Pinterest's {0} and acknowledge that you've read our {1}. {2}

ideas.heading: Search for an idea
ideas.paragraph: What do you want to try next? Think of something you’re into—like “easy chicken dinner”—and see what you find.

save-ideas.heading: Save ideas you like
save-ideas.paragraph: Collect your favorites so you can get back to them later.

shop.heading: See it, make it, try it, do it
shop.paragraph: The best part of Pinterest is discovering new things and ideas from people around the world.

signup.heading: Sign up to get your ideas
signup.title: Welcome to Pinterest
signup.subtitle: Find new ideas to try
signup.email-error-invalid: Hmm...that doesn't look like an email address
signup.email-error-empty: Don't forget to include an email address
signup.password-error-empty: Don't forget to include a password
signup.password-error-length: Your password is too short! You need 6+ characters
signup.password-error-number: Your password doesn't contain at least one number
signup.password-error-special: Your password needs to contain a special character
signup.birthdate-error: You missed a spot. Don't forget to add your birthday.
signup.birthdate-info: To help keep Pinterest safe, we now require your birthdate. Your birthdate also helps us provide more personalized recommendations and relevant ads. We don't share this information and it won't be visible on your profile.
signup.legal-text: By continuing, you agree to Pinterest's {0} and acknowledge that you've read our {1}. {2}
signup.business-account: Sign up for a business account
